title: Singapore’s first dedicated methanol bunkering ship slated for the end of next year
dc:creator: Sam Chambers
description: Global Energy Trading and Stellar Ship Management Services, wholly owned subsidiaries of Global Energy Group, have contracted Japan’s Sasaki Shipbuilding to build a 4,000 dwt tanker, which will become the first dedicated methanol bunkering ship in Singapore, the world’s largest bunkering hub, when it delivers at the end of next year. Loh Hong Leong, group …
